Sentencas: Natural gas was reformed with anode off-gas of a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) in a laboratory reactor using model gases.
Titulo: Carbon formation in catalytic steam reforming of natural gas with SOFC anode off-gas

Sentencas: Nickel and precious metal catalysts were tested at 650 degrees C and 700 degrees C inlet temperature.
Titulo: Carbon formation in catalytic steam reforming of natural gas with SOFC anode off-gas

Sentencas: The oxygen to carbon (O/C) molar ratio of the inlet gas was varied between 0.3 and 2.0 to find out the limit O/C ratio for carbon formation.
Titulo: Carbon formation in catalytic steam reforming of natural gas with SOFC anode off-gas

Sentencas: Two natural gas compositions were used: low purity Danish gas and high purity Russian gas.
Titulo: Carbon formation in catalytic steam reforming of natural gas with SOFC anode off-gas

Sentencas: The experimental limit was found to be 0.9-1.25 for nickel catalyst and 0.5-0.75 for precious metal catalyst.
Titulo: Carbon formation in catalytic steam reforming of natural gas with SOFC anode off-gas

Sentencas: The limit was higher with Danish gas than with Russian gas in the experiments with nickel catalyst but this effect was not observed with the precious metal catalyst.
Titulo: Carbon formation in catalytic steam reforming of natural gas with SOFC anode off-gas

Sentencas: A good correlation between experimental results and thermodynamic calculations was found using the principle of actual gas: the calculations estimated the O/C limit ratio for nickel at 1.0 and for precious metal catalyst between 0.5 and 0.7.
Titulo: Carbon formation in catalytic steam reforming of natural gas with SOFC anode off-gas
